entry.sentence: The next day he left earlier than he had intended .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (DT The) (JJ next) (NN day)) (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD left) (ADVP (RBR earlier)) (SBAR (IN than) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN intended)))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(day-3, The-1) amod(day-3, next-2) tmod(left-5, day-3) nsubj(left-5, he-4) root(ROOT-0, left-5) advmod(left-5, earlier-6) mark(intended-10, than-7) nsubj(intended-10, he-8) aux(intended-10, had-9) advcl(left-5, intended-10)

entry.sentence: He had been with his mother for the last few hours .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP He)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN been) (PP (IN with) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN mother))) (PP (IN for) (NP (DT the) (JJ last) (JJ few) (NNS hours))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(been-3, He-1) aux(been-3, had-2) root(ROOT-0, been-3) poss(mother-6, his-5) prep_with(been-3, mother-6) det(hours-11, the-8) amod(hours-11, last-9) amod(hours-11, few-10) prep_for(been-3, hours-11)

entry.sentence: He would not have been able to tell her about his father 's infidelity .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP He)) (VP (MD would) (RB not) (VP (VB have) (VP (VBN been) (ADJP (JJ able) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB tell) (NP (PRP her)) (PP (IN about) (NP (NP (PRP$ his) (NN father) (POS 's)) (NN infidelity)))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(able-6, He-1) xsubj(tell-8, He-1) aux(able-6, would-2) neg(able-6, not-3) aux(able-6, have-4) cop(able-6, been-5) root(ROOT-0, able-6) aux(tell-8, to-7) xcomp(able-6, tell-8) dobj(tell-8, her-9) poss(father-12, his-11) poss(infidelity-14, father-12) prep_about(tell-8, infidelity-14)
